text: William H. Thompson (July 8, 1913 - July 15, 1971) was an American radio personality and voice actor. His career stretched from the 1930s until his death. He was a featured comedian playing multiple roles on the Fibber McGee and Molly radio series. He was the voice of Droopy in most of the Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer cartoon studio theatrical cartoons from 1943 to 1958. ==Other websites== Category:1913 births Category:1971 deaths Category:People from Terre Haute, Indiana
title: Bill Thompson (voice actor)
